name: planted.nuggets
description: Golden-brown and crispy outside, juicy and flavorful inside. The perfect two-bite snack.
longDescription: Our planted.nuggets are everything you want in a nugget. Golden-brown and perfectly crispy on the outside, juicy and full of flavor on the inside. Sized for the perfect two-bite experience, they're the better choice for snacking, dipping, or adding to your favorite meals. Quality ingredients, clear conscience.
ingredients: Water, pea protein (20%), wheat flour, breadcrumbs, rapeseed oil, pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Pan-fry for 3-4 minutes until crispy, or bake at 200°C for 10-12 minutes. Serve with your favorite dipping sauces.

steps.title: Choose
steps.description: Pan-fry for extra crispy. Oven at 200°C for hands-off.

steps.title: Dip
steps.description: Your sauce, your rules. BBQ, honey mustard, sriracha.
